divs: Sighting Detailswe were going home.hwy 80 east,2 miles or so from shreveport.i thought "thats a odd water tower?"we stopped.got out .so did other drivers.silentlyjust above trees very large black triangle with 3 lights at the corners and one red light offcenter from the middle.the red light was blinking.the triangle slowly "slid whileturning" like it was on ice.it drifted then flew away at high speed.we were only 2 or 3 hundred feet away at the time.across the street 200 feet or so isBARKSDALE AFB.ALSO 10 YEARS LATER SAME SECTION OF ROAD,A FLAMING"BALL" went across sky in same direction .i called police fire forest services'all went un noticed there are signs requesting to report fires or odd behavior because of the air baseI NEVER REPORTED THE TRIANGLE. ONE MORE THING IT WAS DAY LIGHT AND IN A POPULATED AREA.
